title: Rewards for old Honor are rolling out by 1/10

replies.body: Hopefully I get them all. Had almost 1k honors in each category.
wow that is intense - good job!
The server transfer faq says honor is reset when moving servers does this mean people who moved will not get icons based on their previous server honor badges?

They answered that in the FAQ linked in the bottom of this post, short answer is no you don't get icon for honor you had on a server you moved from.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012005308

Says "Were in the top 10% of <X-Honor> in your region" but what about people that changed region last year?
I played in both. I moved from OCE to LAS so I played at both servers on the last 2+ years.
I'm afraid I may not get the icons :'(
when the oce server was still in beta i switched form NA, had all the ribbons then when i got into oce. all gone, never got them back either. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ but what can we do
Unfortunately when you moved regions your honor was reset, so you would need to have earnt enough under the old system since the reset to qualify.
So I guess only people who play bot games on OCE will have them. What sort of server system just deletes the info when you move.
What was the least Rewarded Icon from the old honor system
Aye, I got them all :D

Had a total of 10 or more honours? So basically everyone who had an account then is getting the combined honour icon... I had over 1000 total honours, feels kinda cheap that you set the reward bar at 10.

I switched regions and lost my old Honor ribbons. Will I still get icons?

When you moved, your honor progress was reset. If you met the requirements after the region swap, you’ll still earn the icons.

RIP OCE players :|
Those ribbons were never in OCE though, especially when everyone transferred from NA to OCE.
What if you lost the ribbon after some time? Do you still get the icon?
Yep!
Im a icon lover.Hopefully I can get them all.But forget how much honour points did I have.
I assume if you've had all the ribbons you get all the icons?, or is it the last one you had
If you had every type of ribbon then you'll receive every type of icon.
Damn, I didn't get a single ribbon even after gaining over 200 honors in each category. Never lucky {{item:3070}}
The ribbon's haven't all been distributed out yet. They said the process will be done by October 1st.

Something that confused me about the old honour system was that i had over 300 teamwork honours and 180 friendlies but never got a ribbon... i doubt i'm in the top 10% either so. *Shrug* i miss out i guess.

A lot of people have this confusion don't worry, but to get an honour ribbon it didn't matter HOW MANY you had, it mattered HOW OFTEN you were getting them, if you got an honour or 2 every game for like 2 weeks or so you'd have gotten whichever honour ribbon you were getting more honours from. i don't believe the exact amount of honours you had (even if you had like 1000+) really did much to determine if you got one or not.
Yet i somehow got all but the 'great mentor' icon, but i never got a single ribbon of any type. i am now confused. :/
I used to have the Great Teammate ribbon back in 2013,Started playing again a few weeks ago and didn't get my icons....Am i missing something?
I'm so happy that I got all 5 of them, Thanks Riot.
I got every single one of them. I knew my loss streak and trolls/afks during gold 5 promos wasn't for nothing.
I had each banner (I think) shortly after it came out but I hadn't had one for a long time before it retired, is it based on where u were when it ended or from throughout it's entirety?
what about when u have the ribbon back when oce was not around / on na and when we came to the new server we lost it
So Cool {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
What does it mean by ten or more honours?
It means the old honor system - eg to receive an Honorable Opponent, Friendly, Teamwork or Helpful honor under the old system. For the last icon you need to have received 10 or more of any type.

I stopped playing for some time on the OCE server. Will my ribbons have decayed? I had 2 back then, but no clue what the status would have been since I came back after the new system was already here.
If you had the ribbon at any time you'll receive it. Assuming you didn't transfer your account or receive a penalty since then.
When are they arriving? to our summoners?
The process will complete by October 1 AEST
I know I've gotten **Honorable Opponent**, **Great Leader** and **Great Teammate** ribbons but not entirely sure if I got **Great Mentor**... Here's to hoping I did!

So, since you can only have one ribbon at a time, you're likely gonna get only one of the top four icons? Why not just make it so that anyone eligible for the ribbon even if they couldn't actually receive it because they already had one get the icon too.

Also, Riot fix your damn game, servers were out for an extra hour and when they came online, the games wouldn't start anyway.{{summoner:3}}
hopefully ill get at least 2 because i easily had more then 10 honours and i had a honorable opponent ribbon that use to come and go

I mean... really? Why show us this? Honor was bugged because of region changing this entire time and nobody at rito gave a damn. Pretty insulting to be honest, seeing 'rewards' go out for honor, when its literally impossible for some of us to get it due to a bug.
So do suspensions deny our eligibility to get these icons?
I'm guessing I'm not getting an icon because I had a ribbon then my account got a suspension for trash talking my own friend :(
Hundreds of honors never a ribbon lol feelsbadman :^)
I had 400 of each too but i got banned 1 day befor the update for the new honor system so i lost all of my honors what happens then?
what type, like a low priority queue or a suspension

Dear god it was predicted...'riot better not just give us some shitty icon' MagikcarpUsedFly. nice job riot thanks for the shitty icon. To make it even better one of them has the requirement of 10 honours...10...you can get that in a couple of days even if you are a complete arsehole. It's almost like the honour system meant nothing at all. Way to encourage non-toxicity.

Thanks Riot for the free icon**
ftfy
i moved to japan server earlier this year for a week, then i moved back to OCE, will i still get the icons
So Ive had each ribbon before, that mean i get them all? And the 5th one, is that 10 or more points in any honor or what? i had about 3-600 in each :/
you'll get them all
